sentences.en: Alcohol dehydrogenase An enzyme that converts ethanol into acetaldehyde ( ethanal ).
sentences.cn: 醇脱氢酶:把乙醇转化为 乙醛 的酶.

sentences.en: But the significance of the quarrel goes well beyond ethanol.
sentences.cn: 但是这场争论的意义远远不止于乙醇问题。

sentences.en: Ethanol will interfere with subsequent manipulations of the DNA.
sentences.cn: 酒精会干扰之后的DNA操作.

sentences.en: In Brazil nearly all new cars are able to run on ethanol.
sentences.cn: 在巴西几乎所有的新车都能够使用乙醇燃料.

sentences.en: It is soluble in water and glycerine and slightly soluble in ethanol.
sentences.cn: 溶于水和甘油,微溶于乙醇.

sentences.en: It is soluble in water, slightly soluble in ethanol.
sentences.cn: 溶于水, 微溶于乙醇.

sentences.en: It was important for ethanol production using cellulose in industrial application.
sentences.cn: 这对工业生产中利用纤维素为原料发酵生产酒精具有重要意义.

sentences.en: Its plants require less capital than those for ethanol.
sentences.cn: 开展生物柴油的生产不需要像乙醇那样投入那么多资金.

sentences.en: Methods: The rats colitis model was produced by TNBS and ethanol enemas.
sentences.cn: 方法应用三硝基苯磺酸和乙醇制备大鼠免疫性结肠炎模型.

sentences.en: No cars in Brazil run on pure gasoline anymore. The government requires that all vehicles run on blended fuel of about one-quarter ethanol.
sentences.cn: 如今巴西不再使用单纯靠汽油驱动的汽车，政府要求所有机动车均采用含四分之一乙醇的混合燃料。

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate toxicity of ethanol extracts from hippocampus.
sentences.cn: 目的研究海马乙醇提取物的毒性作用.

sentences.en: One alternative might be to make ethanol from something other than corn.
sentences.cn: 一种选择是使用除玉米以外的东西来生产乙醇.

sentences.en: Result: Tussah colloidal solution lowered the density of ethanol.
sentences.cn: 结果: 柞蚕丝胶可降低乙醇浓度.

sentences.en: Some states require an ethanol - gas mixture to cut pollution.
sentences.cn: 有些州要求用酒精 — 汽油混合物以便减少污染.

sentences.en: Suncor produces oil, natural gas, wind - generated electricity and ethanol.
sentences.cn: 森科尔生产石油, 天然气, 风力发电和乙醇.

sentences.en: The separation of acetone, ethanol, benzene, chloroform, toluene was performed on a 10 % PEG - 20 M Chromosorb - W - AW - DMCS column.
sentences.cn: 对样品中残留丙酮 、 乙醇 、 苯 、 氯仿 、 甲苯的分离选用10%PEG-20Mchromosorb -W-AW-DMCS 公谱柱.

sentences.en: They exposed live ones to either the smell of their dead brethren or an ethanol control.
sentences.cn: 他们在活的七鳃鳗前释放它们死去的同胞的气息或者一种乙醇制剂。

sentences.en: This fact shows that MTBE and ethanol retard the oxidation of alkanes.
sentences.cn: 这表明,在燃烧的起始阶段,MTBE、乙醇有抑制烷烃燃烧的作用.

sentences.en: This includes construction of 15 ethanol plants with assistance from Brazil.
sentences.cn: 这包括在巴西的帮助下建设15个乙醇生产厂。

trans.tran_en: the type of alcohol in alcoholic drinks, which can also be used as a fuel for cars
